description:
<p>With the forthcoming retirement of a member of our nursing team, we are seeking to employ a Specialist Nurse with a Non-Medical Prescribing qualification. The role will include; supporting patients with the management of long term conditions and minor illness. You should have at least two years experience in general nursing, have a strong team ethic and be able to work independently.</p>
<p>Riverside Surgery is a training practice serving a diverse population, committed to the training and development of its staff.</p>
title: Specialist Nurse / Non-Medical Prescriber
